text: The 1st Messina Grand Prix was a motor race, run to Formula Junior rules, held on 23 August 1959 at Ganzirri Lake circuit in Messina, Italy. The race was part of the Italian Formula Junior Championship. ==Final standings== {| class="wikitable" width=55% style="font-size:90%; text-align:left;" |- !# !!Driver!!Country!!Car!!Time/Laps |- |align=center|1 || Fritz d'Orey || || Stanguellini-Fiat||align=center|51m32.0 |- |align=center|2 || Christian Bino Heins || || Stanguellini-Fiat||align=center|20 |- |align=center|3 || Raffaele Cammarota || || Stanguellini-Fiat||align=center|20 |- |align=center|4 || Berardo Taraschi || || Taraschi-Fiat||align=center|20 |- |align=center|5 || Antonio Maglione || || de Sanctis-Fiat||align=center|20 |- |align=center|6 || Henri Grandsire || || Stanguellini-Fiat||align=center|20 |- |align=center|7 || Carmelo Genovese || || Stanguellini-Fiat||align=center|19 |- |align=center|8 || Giacomo Russo || || Stanguellini-Fiat||align=center|19 |- |align=center|9 || Domenico Lo Coco || || Moretti-Fiat || |- |align=center|10 || Jacques Jauson || || Taraschi-Fiat || |} ==References== ==External links== * I Gran Premio di Messina Junior (race full report) Category:Messina Grand Prix
